name: Lowa Mauria Gore-Tex Backpacking Boots - Women's
description: Stable trekking and backpacking boots that support feet on rough trails. The padded tongue and ankle flex allow your foot to move naturally, and zone lacing allows you to customize the tension over your foot. A stable insole and midsole, combined with a grippy sole, keep you upright and supported when carrying a heavy pack.Nubuck leather upper with Gore-Tex waterproof-breathable membrane.FlexFit ankle zone for easier movement.C4 tongue and X-lacing® keeps padded tongue where you want it, preventing blisters.2 independent lacing zones and roller eyelets let you fine-tune the fit.Stiff nylon insole supports feet.DuraPU® polyurethane midsole with supination and pronation support.Vibram® Apptrail outsole with multi-directional lugs.
